comments: Mr. Poroszok, is very caring with all his students. He takes his time to explain and answer all our questions. His lectures are very understandable. When we all turn in our class assignments, he always sits one on one and explains our mistakes. He\'s down to earth, and it\'s obvious he enjoys his job. "I will be a great writer"once I\'m done.

comments: Mr. Poroszok somehow finds a way to make writing and listening to lectures interesting. He\'s not a harsh grader but he doesn\'t give easy A\'s either. You need to work for a good grade, as is expected in college. He gives incredible feedback for each paper you turn in to help you improve for the next. He\'s a great teacher and an equally great person.
